report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle:** [Insert Vehicle Make, Model, and Year]

**Location of Damage:** Rear Tail Light Assembly

**Type of Damage:** The rear tail light assembly appears to have a noticeable crack or chip on the clear lens, specifically in the lower left portion of the light. This damage is likely caused by an impact or collision.

**Additional Notes:**
- The rest of the tail light assembly seems intact with no other visible signs of damage.
- The surrounding area of the tail light does not show any signs of additional damage such as scratches or dents.

**Recommendation:**
- Replace the damaged tail light assembly to ensure proper functionality and safety compliance.

**Photograph Reference:**
- The attached photograph clearly shows the crack/chip in the lower left section of the tail light lens.

**Completed by:**
[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Insurance Company Name]
